entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
